doc.field: CHICAGO DELIVERABLE OAT STOCKS CHICAGO, April 7 The CFTC reported the following stocks of oats in Chicago as of Friday, April 3 , deliverable against Chicago Board of Trade futures in 000's bushels - CURRENT WEEK YEAR WEEK AGO AGO DEL GRADES 0 0 64 NON-DEL GRADES/UNGRADED 57 74 32 CCC STOCKS 0 0 0 TOTAL OATS STOCKS 57 74 96 Reuter
